text_logic_form: The length of the line $AC$ is $188$ units.
The length of the line $BD$ is $214$ units.
The measure of angle $BPC$ is $70$ degrees.
Point $P$ is the midpoint of the line $AC$.
Find the perimeter of the quadrilateral $ABCD$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The length of the line $AC$ is $188$ units.

The measure of angle $BPC$ is $70$ degrees.
Point $P$ is the midpoint of the line $AC$.

diagram_logic_form: Point $P$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $C$.
Point $P$ also lies on the line connecting $B$ and $D$.
The length of the line $AD$ is equal to the length of the line $BC$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AD$, $AC$, $AP$, $BD$, $BC$, $BP$, $DC$, $DP$, and $CP$, forming the quadrilateral and its diagonals.
